docs.title: Systems Engineering Study Notes
docs.text:
These notes are a structured study journey through core systems engineering concepts.

They are written clearly, practically, and without unnecessary abstraction.

The chapters follow a progressive structure:

  • Chapter 1 – System Overview
  • Chapter 2 – Airframe & Structures
  • Chapter 3 – Propulsion
  • Chapter 4 – Avionics & Flight Control
  • Chapter 5 – Electrical Power Systems
  • Chapter 6 – Communication & Ground Control
  • Chapter 7 – Ground Segment & Workflow
  • Chapter 8 – Architecture Basics
  • Chapter 9 – Detailed Architecture
  • Chapter 10 – System Requirements (SRS)

These notes are continuously refined.
